intro: Euphrasia krassnovii, commonly known as the Krassnov's eyebright, is a member of the Scrophulariaceae family. It is a low-growing perennial herb native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. The plant features small, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in early spring. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and covered in fine hairs. Euphrasia krassnovii is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to cold, high-altitude environments.
